body_html:
I seed the random generator with the same seed, reload the state of related random generator at the 100-th batch.
BTW, I also use shelve to pickle all the objects, such model, optimizer, loss and so on. Loading all the stored objects at 100-th for the restart training. All of these come with the same conclusion, that all the restart trainings have the same results and are different to continuous training. I do not know why?

I seed the random generator with the same seed, reload the state of related random generator at the 100-th batch.
BTW, I also use shelve to pickle all the objects, such model, optimizer, loss and so on. Loading all the stored objects at 100-th for the restart training. body:
I seed the random generator with the same seed, reload the state of related random generator at the 100-th batch.
BTW, I also use shelve to pickle all the objects, such model, optimizer, loss and so on. Loading all the stored objects at 100-th for the restart training. All of these come with the same conclusion, that all the restart trainings have the same results and are different to continuous training. I do not know why?
